reviewText:
You can also buy the CD: LEARN SPANISH BY SINGING - NINOS SABIOS and the BOOK: APRENDE CANTANDO - LEARN SPANISH BY SINGING - THE SING ALONG BOOK.  And you will have the whole collection to work with you kids. (learning Spanish - learn other language is great).
http://www.amazon.com/Learn-Spanish-Singing-Aprende-Cantando/dp/B003S92T54/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1432081201&sr=8-5&keywords=learn+spanish+by+singing
http://www.amazon.com/Aprende-Cantando-Learn-Singing-Spanish/dp/1463696787/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1432081235&sr=8-1&keywords=aprende+cantando.
Try the whole collection.

Love it! Nice way to learn Spanish. My kids really enjoyed the DVD. Find the CD music as well is great!
http://www.amazon.com/Learn-Spanish-Singing-Aprende-Cantando/dp/B003S92T54/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1432078398&sr=8-5&keywords=learn+spanish+by+singing

I Bought this DVD because I was looking for a "Farm Animals" DVD but in Spanish, which is not easy to find. My son loves farm animals and he really liked the DVD. It kept him entertained for a long time and he asked me to repeat it over and over again. Of course I do not let him see television for more than 2 hours per day, it is an educational video, I love the fact it has the letters of the animals' names spelled out on the screen so I can work with my son teaching him the letters, we watched the DVD together. I also like the fact it is not just animals or just puppets or just kids, it is a little of everything which keeps my son very happy. I Totally recommend it.
